verse: “Woe to Ariel—Ariel, the town where David encamped!
This entire prophetic revelation will become to you like the words of a sealed book. If it’s given to one who can read it with the command “Read this,” he responds, “I can’t because it is sealed.”
Or if it’s given to one who is illiterate with the command “Read this,” he responds, “I can’t because I cannot read.”
So now, listen to what Yahweh, the God of Israel, who redeemed Abraham, has to say to Jacob’s tribes:
